name: Shadow Strike
text: You accurately strike even those you cannot clearly see.
benefit: You can deal precision damage, such as sneak attack damage, against targets with concealment (but not total concealment).
staminaText: You can spend 5 stamina points when you hit a creature with total concealment to deal precision damage to that creature.
text_zh: 你能在看不清的情况下进行精确打击。
benefit_zh: 你可以对具有隐蔽的目标造成精准伤害（但是不能是全隐蔽），比如偷袭伤害。
staminaText_zh: 当你命中一个全隐蔽的敌人时，你可以消耗5点耐力来对该生物造成精准伤害。
